column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: ɔyɛɛ ne mbabanyin atsɛmbuafo wɔ Israel do."

column2: "Na n’abakan ne dzin dze Joel; na nyia otsia hɔ no dzin dze Abija: wɔyɛɛ atsɛmbuafo wɔ Beer-seba."
"Naaso ne mba annantsew n’akwan do
"Nna Israel mpanyimfo nyinara boaboaa hɔn ano
column3: na wɔbaa Samuel nkyɛn wɔ Rama:"

column2: "na wɔsee no dɛ
column5: na wo mbabanyin so nnantsew w’akwan do: afei hyɛ hen ma hɛn
column6: ma ɔnhwɛ hɛn do dɛ mbrɛ amanaman nyinara yɛ no."

column2: "Na aber a wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ma hɛn ɔhen ma ɔnhwɛ hɛn do no
column4: asɛm no annyɛ Samuel dɛw. Na Samuel bɔɔ mpaa maa EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Samuel dɛ
column3: Tsie ɔman no ne ndze wɔ dza wɔse wo nyinara mu: na nnyɛ ɔwo bi na wɔapow wo na emi mbom na wɔapow me dɛ mma mma minndzi hɔn do hen."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ndzeyɛe a wɔayɛ nyinara ofitsi da a miyii hɔn wɔ Egypt bae
column4: wɔ dɛ wɔapow me na wɔakɔsom enyame fofor no
column5: dɛmara so na wɔdze reyɛ wo so."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei tsie hɔn ndze: mbom kɔkɔ papaara na bɔ hɔn
column3: na kyerɛ hɔn ɔhen a ɔbɔhwɛ hɔn do no ne ndzeyɛe."

column2: "Na Samuel kaa EWURADZE ne nsɛm no nyinara kyerɛɛ ɔman no a wobisaa ɔhen wɔ no hɔ no."
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔhen a ɔbɔhwɛ hom do no mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛe bɛyɛ nye yi: ɔbɛfa hom mbabanyin
column4: na ɔdze hɔn akɔ ne ntseaseanam
column5: na no mpɔnkɔdofo mu; na wobotu mbirika edzi ne ntseaseanam enyim:"

column2: "na ɔdze hɔn ayɛ apem do asafohemfo
column3: na eduonum eduonum do asafohemfo; na ɔbɛma binom adɔw n’asaase

column2: "Na ɔbɛfa hom mbabaa ma wɔaayɛ eduhuamforafo
"Na ɔbɛgye hom nhaban na hom wenyin nture
column3: na hom ngodua nture; mekyerɛ no mu papa no a

column2: "Na ɔbɛfa hom aba na hom wenyin nture no mu ebupɛn du du
column3: na ɔdze ama n’asafohemfo na n’asomfo."

column2: "Na ɔbɛfa hom nkowaa
column4: na hom mberantsɛ mu apapa no
column6: na ɔdze hɔn egu n’edwuma mu."

column2: "Ɔbɛfa hom nguankuw mu ebupɛn du du: na hom ayɛ no nkowaa."
"Na da no hom bosu wɔ hom hen a hom asan mu afa no ntsi; naaso EWURADZE nnkobua hom da no."
"Naaso ɔman no poow dɛ wobetsie Samuel ne ndze; na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Oho; ɔhen ara na yɛregye ma ɔaahwɛ hɛn do;"

column2: "ma hɛn so yɛayɛ dɛ mbrɛ amanaman nyinara tse; na ama hɛn hen ahwɛ hɛn do
"Na Samuel tsee ɔman no hɔn nsɛm nyinara na ɔkɛkaa ne nyinara esiado esiado kyerɛɛ EWURADZE."
"Na EWURADZE see Samuel dɛ
column4: na hyɛ ɔhen ma hɔn. Na Samuel see Israel mbarimba no dɛ
column5: Hom mu obiara nkɔ no kurow mu."
